source.329ac769:
## Cardio Good Fitness Case Study
* The market research team at AdRight is assigned the task to identify the profile of the typical customer for each treadmill product offered by CardioGood Fitness. 

* The market research team decides to investigate whether there are differences across the product lines with respect to customer characteristics.

* The team decides to collect data on individuals who purchased a treadmill at a CardioGoodFitness retail store during the prior three months. 

* The data are stored in the CardioGoodFitness.csv file

source.d303c204:
*Hello, This will be my first project in Kaggle. I started to learn data science few months back. But I didn't realize the use of kaggle and continued to learn new skills required to become a skillful data scientist. Finally, now I,m in a correct path to success, as I landed in improving my skill with Kaggle projects.* 

I selected Cardio Good Fitness Case study to be my first kaggle project. Because, this case study is simple to understand and work. 

As we are in a world, where being fit is very difficult. We all are used to make more carbs, mocktails and many other juncks. Intaking juncks nad continuing to be fit is impossible. One, to be fit we need to leave juncks or forget the wish to be fit for the junck.
So, this data set contains details of treadmill product buyers list with product bought, customer's age, gender, marital state, education, # of hours spent and # of miles.
